meanings.definition: Having a particular volume or size.
meanings.sent1: The small box was volumed just right for the tiny toy.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf was filled with volumed books of various sizes.
meanings.sent3: The volumed cupcake tower delighted the party guests.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as volumed as a symphony echoing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The volumed balloons created a colorful display at the event.

meanings.definition: Contained in a volume or volumes.
meanings.sent1: The volumed data was neatly organized in the folders.
meanings.sent2: The volumed information was too much to read in one sitting.
meanings.sent3: The volumed jars of spices lined the kitchen shelves.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as volumed as the encyclopedia collection.
meanings.sent5: The volumed boxes in the storage room held a mix of items.
